name: Robocraft - Speed Bundle
detailed_description:
The Speed Bundle is the ideal pack to get started quickly in Robocraft, offering players 7 days worth of Premium membership, multiple cosmetics and lots of items to begin building the robot of your dreams!

For a complete rundown of the items featured in the Speed bundle please see below:

  • 12 Protonium Salvage Crates. Each crate contains a random selection of 8 weapon, cosmetic, movement or construction cubes. This type of crate has the highest chance of containing the best items in Robocraft.
  • 7 Days Premium membership which unlocks all items in crates, more paint colours for use in the editor, doubles rate of experience level progression, a special Premium mothership design and triple robits when recycling items.
  • Speedometer to track the speed of a robot
  • Customisable Robot Name Badge
  • 4 Headlamp cubes to light the area around a robot

Please note, the robots featured in the above promotional shots are not included in this bundle. This pack can only be purchased once per Steam account and after purchase the contents of this pack will be awarded on next log-in via Steam.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivalent AMD family
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU, DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivilent AMD family
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel dual core or better with SSE2 support or equivilent AMD family
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 1024x768
